title: Hong Kong police raid Apple Daily newspaper under national security law, arrest staff
content:
1. Hong Kong police raid Apple Daily newspaper under national security law, arrest staff  NBC News
  2. Apple Daily: Hong Kong police raid offices of pro-democracy paper, make arrests  Fox News
  3. Hong Kong police declare Apple Daily newsroom a crime scene as editors and executives arrested under national security law  CNN
  4. World's press condemns arrest of Apple Daily editor-in-chief  The Star Online
  5. Hong Kong press freedom 'hanging by a thread' as arrests mount  Al Jazeera English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 香港警察、国家安全法に基づきApple Daily紙を捜索、スタッフを逮捕
香港警方根据国家安全法突击检查《苹果日报》，逮捕工作人员
香港警方根據國家安全法突擊檢查《蘋果日報》，逮捕工作人員
